ðŸ”µ Conference or Journal,"Spatial Statistics","https://www.sciencedirect.com/journal/spatial-statistics","This journal publishes research on methodological developments and applications in spatial and spatiotemporal statistics, providing insights into event modeling within spatial Context.","Mouad Elhamdi","/assets/images/thumb/spatialstatistics.jpg","Journal"

ðŸ”µ Conference or Journal,"GIScience","https://giscience2025.org/","The International Conference on Geographic Information Science (GIScience) is a top biennial event uniting global researchers to advance spatial analysis, geovisualization, GeoAI, and geosimulation. It features peer-reviewed papers, workshops, and posters, promoting interdisciplinary collaboration.","Mouad Elhamdi","/assets/images/thumb/spatial.jpg","Conference"

ðŸ”µ Conference or Journal,"Conference on Spatial Information Theory","https://geosensor.net/","The conference focuses on the theoretical aspects of geographic information science, improving the fundamental understanding of spatial information, which ranges from cognitive modeling to formal representation.","Mouad Elhamdi","/assets/images/thumb/COSIT.jpg","Conference"

ðŸ”µ Conference or Journal,"GeoMed Conference","https://geomed-conference.com/","An international conference at the intersection of geospatial science and medical/health applications, promoting cross-disciplinary research on environment, space, and health outcomes.","Mouad Elhamdi","/assets/images/thumb/geomed.jpg","Conference"

ðŸ”µ Conference or Journal,"Journal of Agricultural, Biological and Environmental Statistics","https://link.springer.com/journal/13253","This journal focuses on statistical methodologies and their applications in agriculture, biology, and environmental sciences, connecting theoretical concepts with practical data analysis. It is particularly relevant for event modeling.","Mouad Elhamdi","/assets/images/thumb/jabes.jpg","Journal"

ðŸ”µ Conference or Journal,"Environment and Planning B: Urban Analytics and City Science","https://journals.sagepub.com/home/epb","This journal focuses on quantitative urban research, city analytics, geospatial modeling, and computational methods for urban systems.","Mouad Elhamdi","/assets/images/thumb/urbananalytics.jpg","Journal"
